practice_phrases: I think something.
我认为一些事情。
I think I remember.
我认为我记得。
I think you like your car.
我认为你喜欢你的车。
I think it's very interesting.
我认为它非常有趣。
I think you don't like the conversation.
我认为你不喜欢对话。
I think I feel better than yesterday.
我认为我感觉比昨天更好。
I think it's starting to feel easier.
我认为它开始感觉更容易了。
I think you like to go by bus.
我认为你喜欢坐公共汽车去。
I think I'm ready to have a conversation.
我认为我准备好进行对话了。
I think it's easier when we talked to each other.
我认为它更容易当我们互相交谈。
That's a good idea.
那是个好主意。
I think that's a good idea.
我认为那是个好主意。
That's a good idea before you leave.
那是个好主意在你离开前。
I remember that's a good idea.
我记得那是个好主意。
That's a good idea when we talk.
那是个好主意当我们交谈。
I think that's a good idea today.
我认为那是个好主意今天。
That's a good idea to use your car.
那是个好主意用你的车。
I think that's a good idea when we were in the pub.
我认为那是个好主意当我们在酒吧时。
That's a good idea and I wasn't expecting it.
那是个好主意，我没有期待它。
I think that's a good idea and it's very interesting.
我认为那是个好主意，它非常有趣。
This is a good idea.
这是个好主意。
That is a good idea.
那是个好主意。
I think it is a good idea.
我认为它是个好主意。
The conversation is a good idea.
对话是个好主意。
Using your car is a good idea.
用你的车是个好主意。
I think that's a good idea today.
我认为那是个好主意今天。
To go by bus is a good idea.
坐公共汽车去是个好主意。
I think having a conversation is a good idea.
我认为进行对话是个好主意。
I think learning something new is a good idea.
我认为学习新东西是个好主意。
I think when we talked to each other is a good idea.
我认为我们互相交谈时是个好主意。
A good idea.
个好主意。
That's a good idea.
那是个好主意。
It's a good idea.
它是个好主意。
I think it's a good idea.
我认为它是个好主意。
Using your car is a good idea.
用你的车是个好主意。
I think the conversation is a good idea.
我认为对话是个好主意。
To go by bus is a good idea today.
坐公共汽车去今天是个好主意。
I think learning something new is a good idea.
我认为学习新东西是个好主意。
I think when we talk to each other is a good idea.
我认为我们互相交谈时是个好主意。
I think that's a good idea.
我认为那是个好主意。
